title: 1D kinematics - change in velocity for constant a

content.question: An object on a straight, horizontal track with an initial positive velocity undergoes a constant acceleration of <math alttext="negative 5 meters per second squared" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mo>-</mo><mn>5</mn><mspace width="0.2em"></mspace><msup><mtext>m/s</mtext><mn>2</mn></msup></math> for <math alttext="4" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>4</mn></math> seconds. Which of the following is the change in velocity of the object during this interval?

choices.label: <math alttext="0 meters per second" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mspace width="0.4em"></mspace><mn>0</mn><mspace width="0.2em"></mspace><mtext>m/s</mtext></math>

skill.text: 2.B: Calculate or estimate an unknown quantity with units from known quantities, by selecting and following a logical computational pathway.
